column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The service was impeccable. Our waiter was very friendly and knowledgable. We started our meal with Belle Meade old fashioneds and the baked goat cheese.  Smooth and well balanced
column2: it was the best old fashioned that I have ever had. The baked goat cheese was fantastic.  For our main course
column3: my husband ordered the dry aged bone in ribeye
column4: which was HUGE. I ordered the petite filet mignon - duchess cut
column5: which was the perfect size for me. Both were delicious and perfectly cooked. I enjoyed the roasted tomato on the side.  We also had the wild mushrooms.  They were seasoned well and quite tasty.   For my husbands birthday
column6: they brought him chocolate ice cream with a sparkler. But that was the perfect end to our night.
